entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
